name: Personal Space Invaders (LZorro)
description:
Personal Space Invaders

a game built for PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams

August 2018 - Parody games - "Bootleg"

  • Use a controller or arrow keys to move.
  • Zero key to reset, Escape key to exit
  • Your Anxiety meter will rise if the aliens stay too close to you for too long (no consequence to this at the moment)
  • Escape by fleeing on the UFO when it flies by

The gameplay is not very robust, so don't expect much. Future plans include level advancement/waves (aliens gradually getting faster, more aliens spawning), possible shooting mechanic, adjusted speed and movement, speed boost when anxiety is high to escape.
